text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The Intel Core i7 in the Refurbished: Lenovo Laptop Y40 14” Full HD Gaming Notebook with Intel Core i7 4510U 2.00Ghz (3.10Ghz), 8GB Memory, 1TB HDD + 8GB SSD, Radeon R9 M275 2GB, Windows 8.1 64-Bit is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The Intel Core i7 in the Refurbished: Lenovo Laptop Y40 14” Full HD Gaming Notebook with Intel Core i7 4510U 2.00Ghz (3.10Ghz), 8GB Memory, 1TB HDD + 8GB SSD, Radeon R9 M275 2GB, Windows 8.1 64-Bit is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Elden Ring. The build quality of the Refurbished: Lenovo Laptop Y40 14” Full HD Gaming Notebook with Intel Core i7 4510U 2.00Ghz (3.10Ghz), 8GB Memory, 1TB HDD + 8GB SSD, Radeon R9 M275 2GB, Windows 8.1 64-Bit is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Valorant. The build quality of the Refurbished: Lenovo Laptop Y40 14” Full HD Gaming Notebook with Intel Core i7 4510U 2.00Ghz (3.10Ghz), 8GB Memory, 1TB HDD + 8GB SSD, Radeon R9 M275 2GB, Windows 8.1 64-Bit is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
